name: gooseberry
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small, green fruit covered with short hairs. Gooseberries grow on bushes and have a sour taste: Gooseberries are used for making pies and jam.
Bestfotostudio/iStock / Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
